title: Metal Gear Solid: Codec Dialer v3.2.0
description:
You simply type in a number that you want to call and "Metal Gear Solid: Codec Dialer" will call it for you with real sounds of the game!
In this PRO version you can set the app as DEFAULT DIALER!!!

FEATURES:

- change the skin (MGS, MGS2: Sons of Libery, MGS3: Snake eater, MGS4: Guns of the Patriots, MGR: Revengeance, MGS5)
- set this app as default dialer
- when you press "CALL" button the call starts immediately
- type in a number and call it
- edit the Snake's image, MetalGearSolizer you and talk with Roy Campbell :)

OUT SOON:

- select a
 contact from address book
- save your contacts
- news sounds when you open/close the app as original game

What's New:

Version 3.2.0
- Fix some important bugs
- Remove contacts feature, we work to fix all bugs ;)
Version 2.1.0
- Now you can save your new contacts!
Version 2.0.0
- 3 new skins!!!Now you can choose between 4 skins: MGS1, MGS2, MGS3 and MGS4
- fixed some bugs
